channel.title: Join the Runeverse project!
channel.description:
The Runeverse Project aims to document the Runescape packets and systems, including the movement system, interaction system, etc. We need docs for both the old and the new clients. If you want more information, or if you want to join, contact zstars (or zstars_) at irc. If I am online, I will probably be at #rsreversing.
We will be using a closed SVN repository. I will create accounts for those who join the project.
Note: No especial knowledge required, other than some willingness to document or to learn.
